Package dev.toliner.yokaidrone.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Ability<T extends AbilityConfig>
    Ability is a configurable function for interface Yokai. When the Ability is gained by interface Yokai, it should configure JDABuilder based on config to capture event from Discord. All implementation should be object-declaration
    AbilityConfig
    Empty interface for configuration of interface Ability.
    Yokai
    Interface for Yokai, which is one set of bot functions. The first thing you should do when you build bot is choose or implement Yokai. Yokai must be specified by command-line argument, then all specified Yokai is loaded by bootstrap. Each Yokai can have some interface Ability. You can gain and configure interface Abilitys by overriding init method. All implementation must have non-parameter constructor.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Abilities  
    DependencyMap  
    YokaiKt
